attributes.action: Stop the governments proposal on brexit.
attributes.background: The government must leave the EU completely.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/213782
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221747
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220248
